reviewText: I bought this video For my grandson and when it was delievered there was 2 movies the nativity and he has Risen. when we went to watch it there was no disk in the case at all. we had just opened it last night and no DVD in the case.
I was looking for a simple Christmas movie for my toddler to watch and had such a hard time finding any! This was perfect and he keeps talking about the entire story line. I love it!

Story is an absolute 5 stars. I'm giving four though because of the quality of video. The DVD intro is so crisp, but the movie itself is much more lower in quality. It is a wonderful video regardless though and I still recommend.
My 21 month old granddaughter loves this movie.  It is wonderful for little ones and I will be looking for more dvd's about the bible for her.
